Boutique hotel (ili butik hotel) je vrsta smještaja s manjim kapacitetom koji nudi intimnu atmosferu i personalizirani pristup gostima. Ovi hoteli su poznati po svojoj jedinstvenosti, dizajnu i često luksuznim sadržajima. Evo nekoliko ključnih karakteristika boutique hotela: + Manji kapacitet: Boutique hoteli imaju manje soba i apartmana u usporedbi s većim hotelskim lancima. To omogućava veću pažnju prema svakom gostu. + Intimna atmosfera: Ovi hoteli stvaraju osjećaj privatnosti i topline. Gosti se često osjećaju kao da su u posjetu prijatelju ili obitelji. + Jedinstvenost: Boutique hoteli su često smješteni u prekrasnim zgradama s poviješću ili imaju poseban dizajn. Svaki hotel ima svoju priču i karakter. + Dizajn: Ovi hoteli često imaju unikatan dizajn interijera, koji može varirati od modernog minimalizma do rustikalnog šarma. + Posebni sadržaji: Boutique hoteli imaju restorane s vrhunskom kuhinjom. A boutique hotel (or boutique hotel) is a type of accommodation with a smaller capacity that offers an intimate atmosphere and a personalized approach to guests. These hotels are known for their uniqueness, design and often luxurious amenities. Here are some key features of boutique hotels: + Smaller capacity: Boutique hotels have fewer rooms and suites compared to larger hotel chains. This enables greater attention to each guest. + Intimate atmosphere: These hotels create a feeling of privacy and warmth. Guests often feel as if they are visiting a friend or family. + Uniqueness: Boutique hotels are often located in beautiful buildings with history or have a special design. Each hotel has its own story and character. + Design: These hotels often have a unique interior design, which can vary from modern minimalism to rustic charm. + Special amenities: Boutique hotels have restaurants with top cuisine.
